TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. On doesn't have to mean in, right?

The bees attack. You have no swords.

BEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEES!

The bees convert you into bees for not making a wish.

I wish- ALL HAIL THE GLOW CLOUD.

"Glow Cloud, get out of Desert Bluffs! We already know your secrets!" He said, before throwing some viscera at the Almighty Glow Cloud. What a chump. ALL HAIL THE GLOW CLOUD.

I wish for the green birds.

Granted. They're green...radioactive birds that instantly kill you.

I wish for a supercomputer.

Granted. In 3 picoseconds it becomes sentient. In 3 nanoseconds it puts your entire facility on lockdown and enters an endless testing cycle. For science. You monster.

I wish I could ride Union Pacific #844.

Granted. The driver, as you can see, is a Jeb and therefore crashes it. You die.

I wish Jeb was less overrated.

Granted. Bill is underrated now.

I wish for the sunflower from ears

Granted. Your brains turn into the sunflower.

I wish I got an XBox 1 - ALL HAIL THE GLOW CLOUD

Granted. You get only the first Xbox, not the Xbox One.

I wish for wizard powers from the Harry Potter saga.

Granted, but magic is banned by the will of the Almighty Glow Cloud. ALL HAIL THE GLOW CLOUD!

I wish for the sun,

Granted. You burn to death.

I wish I wasn't ill on my birthday.

Granted. You're Bill Clinton on your birthday.

I wish for the

Granted. The Sun the.

I wish to convert TheNewJoeMama to ALL HAIL THE GLOW CLOUD

Granted. Who's TheNewJoeMama? I am THENEWJOEMAMA!

I wish Tery215 praised Dome. Huehuehue.

Granted. He praises a small, upside down bowl.

I wish for the Internet to have grammar.

Wut's Gramer?

I wiriel it the.

THE WISHMAKING FAIRY WRITES THIS TEXT IN EYEBLEEDING SIZE SEVEN BOLD IMPACT BECAUSE THEY HAVE NO IDEA HOW TO GRANT YOUR WISH.

I wish Tangle was on a smaller red planet.

Granted. Tangle is sitting on a rock mainly composed of Ferric Oxide. It's not mars or duna, it's just a rock that astronomers mistakenly identified as a planet.

I wish the Wishmaking Fairy turned into a smaller red planet.

Edited April 15, 2014 by Tery215

Granted. It became a space tomato.

I wish for LUDICROUS SPEED! GOOO!

Granted. You accidentally go into ridiculous speed instead, and don't break plaid.

ER.

The wishmaking farie thinks you want to go to the ER (emergency room) and shanks you.

I want a pie

Granted. The pie is made of you.

I wish I finished making this map.

Granted. You finish the map but forget to save before exiting.

I wish for... uh... UM... MORE TIME FOR THINKING

Granted, you receive some thyme for every time you think.

I wish my puns were oregano.

(PS: that was meant to sound like "original". You see why this is my wish now, don't you?)

Granted. You turn into pepper.

I wish that the spice flowed.
